title: Mr.
text:
Visit after visiting the hotel Tune feel at home from the good handling and ethics who work in the hotel as if they were your family and not able differentiate from person to another and especially thank connected to the director of the hotel Mrs Mary and
Miss VOLORINA and nights shift
Mr. GEZIM and
Mr. ALEX and
Mr. FRANCESCO
Thanks for all and I wish everyone luck and a happy life
